name: Light sensors | Day light sensors
metaTitle: Merrytek Daylight Sensor for Smart Lighting Control | Onco Solutions
metaDescription: Automate your lighting with the Merrytek daylight sensor. Simple, efficient, and reliable control based on ambient light levels for energy savings.
shortDescription: Automatically switch street lights, garden lights, shop windows, and displays based on ambient light levels. The SKS-100 uses an external sensor to monitor brightness and activates lighting according to your set threshold â€” simple, efficient, and reliable.
description_points: Automatic light control based on ambient brightness
Ideal for outdoor and commercial applications
Easy setting of switching levels directly on the device
Adjustable time delay to eliminate short term fluctuation in illumination
